subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants re-signed quarterback David Carr and released three veterans who ended the season on injured reserve. The Giants terminated the contracts of running back Reuben Droughns, cornerback Sam Madison and safety Sammy Knight. Carr, a seven-year veteran who joined the Giants last year as a backup to Eli Manning, played in three games in 2008, completing 9 of 12 passes for 115 yards and 2 touchdowns. ¶The Jets hired Matt Cavanaugh as their quarterbacks coach. Cavanaugh, who spent 14 seasons in the N.F.L., was the offensive coordinator and quarterbacks coach at the University of Pittsburgh the past four years. Cavanaugh has 11 years of N.F.L. coaching experience, serving as the offensive coordinator for Baltimore (1999-2004) and Chicago (1997-98) and as the quarterbacks coach for San Francisco (1996) and Arizona (1994-95). jets (AP).
